content.text:
# Anyone have a mobility/flexibility routine that they like?

I'm really bad at stretching and I don't do it very often, but I'd like to get better at it. Back when I was doing Starting Strength religiously I was *okay* at doing [Starting Stretching](https://phrakture.github.io/starting-stretching.html), but when I had an injury (left shoulder + right hip during a low-bar squat) I dropped out of my routine entirely.

I'd like to suck less at this, anyone have a routine that they can recommend? I'm good at following systems, not so good at the impromptu "just stretch when you feel like it".

cc: [@angelica](@eANNuLfzX/9rlGODXHYV8WJb+zw2h+d7YsT4vpYPvD0=.ed25519) (I love [this](https://winteryoga.hashbase.io/kriya.html) and [that](https://computer-calm.hashbase.io/one.html)!) [@zach](@ZqH7Mctu/7DNInxuwl12ECjfrAKUX2tBLq1rOldNhg0=.ed25519) [@ailrick](@3oy7lS05WQRV4yzaQVy92LAO9KLqFCnEHzzUDfAWN3c=.ed25519) [@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) [@mikey](@6ilZq3kN0F+dXFHAPjAwMm87JEb/VdB+LC9eIMW3sa0=.ed25519)
